response.original_title: 容祖儿 Another Side Joey My Secret Live 2024 特别版
response.overview: Hong Kong’s first concert leaps onto big screen, with Emperor Cinemas exclusively showcasing the highly anticipated Joey Yung Concert 2023《ANOTHER SIDE ...... JOEY . MY SECRET . LIVE》, a masterpiece created by Joey Yung and her team. This extraordinary concert extends the emotional impact experienced during the unforgettable 34 nights at the HKAPA. Audience can indulge in Joey’s incredible performance enhanced by extraordinary stage effect presented from multiple angles on the cinema screen. This immersive experience will transport you into Joey's Secret Garden, allowing you to feel as part of the concert. The limited screening will commence exclusively at Emperor Cinemas starting 19 Jan. Join together for the unique experience that you should never miss!
response.title: 容祖儿 Another Side Joey My Secret Live 2024 特别版
